Requests.Title: --Example with notes for advanced features--
Requests.Request_Body_FileName_notes: Or select a file to send data from. This will override the Request_Body if populated.
Requests.Follow_Redirects_note: set this to false to disable following redirects. (Not yet implemented in this version)
Requests.ReturnType_notes1: JSON: If you're expecting a JSON, you can enable JSON parsing before saving. (Not yet implemented in this version.)
Requests.ReturnType_notes2: ToFile: When you're expecting binary data, like a pdf or image, select this ReturnType to save it.
Requests.ReturnType_notes3: None: When you're not expecting any data back and you're just trying to send something.
Requests.Output_Filename_notes: Enter the Output_Filename and folder to save the output to.
